extension_description.message: A handy tool for web developers to learn and report site compatibility issues directly within Firefox Developer Tools.

feed_fetch_error.message: Couldn’t load the news feed. Please try again later.

feed_fetch_offline.message: You’re currently offline. Go online to load the news feed.

checker_paragraph_1.message: Given a dataset based on our 800+ articles, we are developing a site compatibility checker that helps you find potential issues on your site, including use of deprecated or removed features. The beta version is coming later this year. Stay tuned!

reporter_paragraph_1.message: Let us know if you found a website — even your own — that doesn’t work properly only in Firefox! We are happy to investigate the issue and take a possible action to solve it. We can be reached by:

about_paragraph_1.message: The Firefox Site Compatibility Working Group is an independent community initiative tackling the backward compatibility and regressions in Firefox. We are creating this browser extension as a handy all-in-one tool for web developers to learn, check and report site compatibility issues directly within Firefox Developer Tools. The source code is available on GitHub, and we are also on Twitter. Your feedback is always welcome!
